Module FileSelector

type 'a t = {
deep : bool;
dft : [ `After | `Before ] option;
filter : bool -> string -> string -> bool;
follow_links : bool;
error : exn -> string -> 'a -> unit;
}
val create : ?⁠deep:bool -> ?⁠dft:[ `After | `Before ] -> ?⁠glob:string -> ?⁠filter:(bool -> string -> string -> bool) -> ?⁠follow_links:bool -> ?⁠error:(exn -> string -> 'a -> unit) -> unit -> 'a t
val globber : ?⁠pathname:bool -> string -> string -> bool
